meta.name: keywords
meta.content: Jeopardy Archive Sally Hardey Bernie Altman Michael Dupee Final clue response question answer Daily Double

meta.name: description
meta.content: An archive of clues and players for Jeopardy! show #2684.

td.p: Sally Hardey, a psychologist from Moraga, California
Bernie Altman, an architect from Los Angeles, California
Michael Dupee, an attorney from Cleveland, Ohio (whose 2-day cash winnings total $29,201)

tr.td: PHOTOGRAPHY
ABBOTT & COSTELLO
U.S. GEOGRAPHY
WOMEN'S FASHIONS
FISH
"NET"s

div.onmouseover:
toggle('clue_J_1_1', 'clue_J_1_1_stuck', '(Mike: What is yellow?)
(Bernie: What is blue?)
...
(Sally: What is [*]?)
(Alex: Ring in first, Sally.)
[Sally rings in.]
(Alex: That\'s it.)
(Sally: What is [*]?)

red

MichaelBernieSally
')

tr.td: National Geographic landscapes often include a person wearing this color; your eye goes to it first
